Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2018 02:28PM Gammy2one wrote: Was your stinging sensation constant or just when you leaned forward or bent over? Mine hurts when I'm in those positions
Posts.Title: Stinging sensation. Trust my gut instinct or my ultrasounds Staceyatmiss Moderators

Posts.Content: Gammy2one wrote: I am a 44 year old female and my last mammogram was Oct. 2017. I woke up yesterday morning with a burning sensation between my right arm pit and breast. When I bend over or lean forward the pain intensifies then subsides. It feels like gravity is stretching my breast. I have no swelling or redness and can't feel any lumps. I called my obgyn today and they feel it's nothing to worry about as I am premenopausal. Is this normal? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stinging sensation around right breast Gammy2one Gammy2one
